data.title: Saint James School
data.text:
Global Perspectives

With a campus community from all over the world, our students are immersed in unique opportunities to experience new traditions, cultures, and ways of thinking.

Learn More

Honor & Character

The Saint James School culture of trust and mutual respect is made possible by an honor code to which every student and teacher agrees to adhere-in the classroom, on the playing field, and in every other facet of life in this community.

Learn More

A Second Home

As a boarding school student, you gain a second home–and a second family of friends, teachers, mentors and coaches who are focused as much on your happiness as your performance in the classroom.

Learn More

Opportunity awaits

At Saint James, you have the opportunity to discover your passions. Whether playing the piano, joining the robotics club, taking a challenging class, or playing a new sport, you’ll stretch yourself here as you engage in new pursuits.

Learn More

SJS Facts

SJS By the Numbers

The Saint James School mission is to prepare young men and women for success in college and inspire them to be leaders for good in the world. We do this within a small and familial residential community that encourages their moral and spiritual growth. Get the facts to learn more about SJS!

SJS at-A-Glance

Live Bravely. Lead for Good.

Meet

the Saints

At Saint James School, you'll live and learn in a caring and collaborative community where students of all backgrounds champion and support each other. Our students seek out opportunities to try new things, push themselves academically, and explore their passions. Along the way, they learn how to live bravely by accepting new challenges with confidence. We invite you to meet a few of our Saints!

Watch Student videos

Visit Our Beautiful Campus

800 Acres of SJS

Our campus offers 14 buildings, 9 playing fields, 12 tennis courts, a driving range, and a natural spring (the Bai Yuka). Visit us to experience first-hand our unique community of friends, teammates, teachers, and mentors. See for yourself that everything you’ve been looking for really does exist in one school.

View the 360 tour

BEST OF BOTH WORLDS

Saint James School is located in Hagerstown, Maryland, just 75 miles from both Baltimore and Washington, DC, with easy access to the major airports in those cities. Our location provides the best of both worlds. You’ll enjoy all the benefits of living near the nation’s capital, while also enjoying the safety and serenity of our rural, Georgian style campus.
